Package audio

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
audio.AudioPlayer
public class AudioPlayer extends Object

The AudioPlayer class provides functionality to play audio files.

Since:
Apr 27, 2024
Author:
Nick Clouse, Andrew Denegar, Molly O'Connor, Kaarin Gaming: base code taken from Kaarin Gaming Youtube, Platform Turtorial episode 25

  • Method Details

    • playSong

      public void playSong(String fileName)
      Plays a song continuously.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the song file to play.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if an audio clip is currently active (playing).
      Returns:
      true if an audio clip is currently active, false otherwise.

    • playSongOnce

      public void playSongOnce(String fileName)
      Plays a song once.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the song file to play.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the currently playing audio clip.

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume(float volumeValue)
      Sets the volume of the currently playing song.
      Parameters:
      volumeValue - The volume value to set (0.0f to 1.0f).
